message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000.  It's a great deal for you, as it's worth $12,000 to you.  Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our prices.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good price, but $9,000 is still a little low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit, but I can't go lower than $9,500.  It's a fair price considering the value to you.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our prices again. How about $9,250?
